typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMP_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		SALARY as string,
		DEPT_ID as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Dept_id as string,
		dept_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@DEPT_ID == source2@Dept_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(source2@Dept_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
